title: Traveled to Poland
description: Had an amazing winter trip to Poland
extendedDescription:
I went to Poland this winter to surprise a friend and ended up having one of the best trips ever. Gdańsk welcomed me with snow, Christmas lights, and the smell of hot wine. I spent my days ice skating, exploring the markets, and trying every local food I could find.

After that, I headed to Kraków, visited Auschwitz, wandered through the old streets, and took a trip to the mountains in Zakopane. Between the snowy hikes, hot springs in Chochołowskie Termy, and speeding around on a snowmobile, I fell completely in love with Polish winters.

title: Tikki
description: I adopted my little cat Tikki
extendedDescription: It was 2020, in the middle of the pandemic, when I was sitting at a T3 alone and isolated. I made one of the best decisions of my life and adopted my little cat Tikki. Ever since then it has been my best companion and friend.

title: Started University
description: Began my Informatics and Computer Engineering Integrated Master's degree at U.Porto - FEUP.
extendedDescription:
In 2016, I kicked off one of the biggest chapters of my life: university. I came in ready for it, so I partied hard, studied harder, and learned a ton, not just from books, but from life itself.

It was a crazy mix of everything: new friends, late-night study marathons, deadlines, projects, and those all-nighters where coffee basically became part of my bloodstream. Looking back, it was a time of growth, discovery, and some of the best memories I’ve got.

title: First Game Project
description: Created my first complete game project and discovered a passion for game development.
extendedDescription: This prototype helped me learn iteration cycles, asset pipelines and build/deploy basics. I shipped a small demo and learned a lot about gameplay loops.

title: Team Leader at Dive Studios
description: Led a talented team at Dive Studios, managing projects and coordinating development efforts.
extendedDescription: Managed multiple game development projects, coordinated cross-functional teams, and helped establish engineering workflows. Mentored junior devs and worked closely with designers to polish features.

title: Graduated Bachelor's Degree
description: Completed my Software Engineering Bachelor's degree with honors.
extendedDescription: Final project focused on systems design and optimization. This graduation was the beginning of the professional journey into game engineering.

title: Tools Lead at Saber Interactive
description: Promoted to Tools Lead Programmer position, working on AAA game development tools.
extendedDescription: Built internal tools for content pipelines and automated repetitive tasks to speed up production. Focused on maintainability and developer ergonomics.

title: Started primary school
description: Completed a challenging mountain hiking expedition and discovered new perspectives.
